creator: ryo_sode@filemaker.com
text:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new test
2. Add a thread and an http sampler
3. under the http sampler, add a response assertion
4. Add a pattern to the Patterns to Test table in the Response Assertion element
5. Click in to the newly created row and type 'abc'. Do no hit enter or click
other fields.
6. Click out of the Response Assertion by clicking on the parent http sampler.
7. Now click on Response Assertion again.

Result: 'abc' disappeared.
Also happens in Win XP and NT, in quite a few (most?) screens and fields.
creator: sebb@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 22818 ***
